Package net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Classes that control the rendering of pages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CmsRequestListener
    Listener to receive notifications of the request/response lifecycle.
    PluginContext.PluginVisitor
    Plugin visitor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoxResourceFactory
    ResourceFactory for a ContentElement.
    CKEditorConnector
    Provides server side integration for the file browser in FCKeditor.
    Cms
    Main servlet for CMS frontend.
    Cms.ServerOptions
    CMS Server options.
    CmsAuthenticationListener
    Does setup after authentication.
    CmsContextFilter
    Filter that sets up the Cms Contexts.
    CmsIntegration<PE extends PageElement>
    Generator implementation for the purpose of integrating with the CMS internals.
    CmsLoginHistoryItemPopulator
    Populates the login history item with information available from the current CMS request/response.
    CmsRequest<T extends PageElement>
    Defines a Request for content in the CMS framework.
    CmsRequestContext
    Context information for a CMS request.
    CmsRequestEvent
    The event used for CmsRequestListener to indicate request/response lifecycle changes.
    CmsRequestListenerConfig
    Configuration object for CmsRequestListener implementations.
    CmsRequestListenerManager
    Manages request listeners.
    CmsResourceAuthenticationDelegate
    Default resource authentication delegate for CMS.
    CmsResponse
    The response for content in the CMS framework.
    CmsSession
    Facade for VM wide storage, HttpSession storage, and Request storage.
    CmsStatus
    Generator of CMS Status information.
    CmsWebAuthenticationDetails
    Web authentication details using a CMS CmsRequest.
    ContentElementResourceFactory
    ResourceFactory for a ContentElement.
    ContentNegotiation
    Negotiates the content type
    ControllerConfiguration
    The controller configuration.
    DAVServlet
    DAV Integration servlet.
    DelegateInfo
    Container of delegate information.
    FactoryIdEncoder
    Encodes/decodes a resource Id for PageElementResource.
    GlobalizationContextAdaptor
    Adaptor that delegates to RenderContext.
    HTMLBoxGenerator
    Box generator for HTML.
    HTMLPageGenerator
    Simple generator that returns content that is HTML.
    IntervalStat
    Interval statistics.
    LinkExternalizer
    Do not use for CMS code that generates HTML for web pages.
    LinkExternalizeTagListener
    Tag listener for externalizing links.
    LinkUtil
    Place to collect link related functions during proteus reorganization project - temporary.
    Log4JFilter
    Extends ClientLog4JFilter to provide the principal name.
    LoginLogoutHelper
    Helper class for login and logout related code.
    LogRequestFilter
    Logs requests and responses.
    MIWTActionableLinkHandler
    Handles implementation of actionable components for MIWTBean instances.
    NDEHelper
    NDE helper.
    PageElementChain
    Represents a chain of page elements.
    PageElementRenderingResolver
    PageElement rendering resolver.
    PageElementSearch
    Used to search the tree for certain criteria.
    PageResourceFactory
    ResourceFactory for a Page.
    PageSyndicationGenerator
    Syndication generator.
    ParsedRequest
    Represents a parsed/resolved request from a user agent.
    ParsedRequest.PageElementAndParent
    PageElement And Parent Class
    PluginContext
    Helper class for CMS information retrieval.
    PluginHelper
    Plugin helper.
    ProcessChain
    Allows nesting of preRenderProcess calls by page elements / Renderers.
    Processor
    Processor for CMS requests.
    RenderChain
    Allows nesting of render calls by page elements / Renderers.
    RequestContextAdaptor
    Adaptor that delegates to RenderContext.
    URLParser
    Utility for parsing URLs.
